timeline.message:
created cra prod build

Signed-off-by: JMadsen <jacob.madsen@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: I do not understand why " app.use('/', router);" is in the if and the else block. If it is needed in both then please move it to before the if.
timeline.author: davidradl

replies.bodyText: Good catch - I originally thought it needed only to be in development, then realized it was needed in both but did not fix the structure. Just fixed this and pushed now.
replies.author: jmmadsen

timeline.message:
moved use router out of if/else statement
